reporter_caption.center: NATIONAL WESTMINSTER BANK, PLC v. COOPER, No. CV03-0348226 S (May 25, 2004)

caption.center: NATIONAL WESTMINSTER BANK, PLC v. SIMON J. COOPER ET AL.

court.center: Connecticut Superior Court, Judicial District of Danbury

unpublished.footnote_body: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.]

opinion_text.unpublished:
Motion for summary judgment is denied because there is a genuine issue of fact as to the existence of liability and damages in this case.
Richards, J. CT Page 7819
